messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2352
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/9/2002 3:25:54 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... Woops. Okay - here is the deal. AOL lets me set a sig line and it goes automatically. I want
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/9/2002 3:25:54 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> > --pam
> > Not speaking officially for:
> > The National Home Education Network
> > http://www.NHEN.org
> > Changing the Way the World Sees Homeschooling!
> >
>
> Pam, when did you change your sn?
> ~Nancy

Woops. Okay - here is the deal. AOL lets me set a sig line and it goes
automatically. I want to promote NHEN in my sig line. But on the
NHEN-sponsored lists it looks like I'm there officially and my own opinions
can get interpreted as being those of the organization itself. So I added the
"not speaking officially for" -- for those lsits. But I can't seem to
remember to take that off when I'm not on those lists.


--pam
Proudly promoting:
The National Home Education Network
http://www.NHEN.org
Changing the Way the World Sees Homeschooling!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
